definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: Take advantage of a digital SLR's screen to review images.
sentences.chinese: 利用好單反相機屏幕來回顧拍過的照片。

sentences.english: Just over a year ago, I got my DSLR camera.
sentences.chinese: 差不多一年前，我買了臺數碼單反相機。

sentences.english: Art Institute of Beijing Film Academy test must be digital SLR camera?
sentences.chinese: 北京電影學院攝影學院藝考必須用數碼單反相機嗎？

sentences.english: DSLRs have the advantage of overall color control via the white balance (WB) setting you use.
sentences.chinese: 數碼單反相機提供白平衡設置以控制全局色彩。

sentences.english: Most SLR cameras use circular polarizers due to the use of beamsplitters.
sentences.chinese: 大多數單反相機使用圓形偏振分光鏡由於使用到。

sentences.english: Did you get a new DSLR for Christmas?
sentences.chinese: 聖誕禮物是一部嶄新的單反相機嗎？

definition: Olympus, Japanese manufacturer of cameras and optical instruments

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3
